ride

Class Ride

  • java.lang.Object
    • ride.Ride
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Ride
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class that represents every ride done
    Author:
    juan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ride

        public Ride()
        Empty constructor for testing

      • Ride

        public Ride(Driver driver,
            Car car,
            Customer customer,
            double[][] trajectory,
            Status status,
            KindOfRide kindOfRide,
            TrafficCondition trafficCondition)
        Constructor for the Ride class
        Parameters:
        driver - Driver that performs the ride
        car - Car that will be driven
        customer - Customer that booked the ride
        trajectory - Trajectory of the ride (initial => X[0][0], Y[1][0] and final point => X2[0][1], Y2[1][1])
        status - Status of the ride
        kindOfRide - Kind of Ride (UberX, UberPool, UberBlack, UberVan)
        trafficCondition - Traffic condition when the ride is executed

      • Ride

        public Ride(Driver driver,
            Car car,
            Customer customer,
            double[][] trajectory,
            Status status,
            KindOfRide kindOfRide,
            TrafficCondition trafficCondition,
            int numOfPeople)
        Another constructor with number of people for the UberPool
        Parameters:
        driver - Driver that performs the ride
        car - Car that will be driven
        customer - Customer that booked the ride
        trajectory - Trajectory of the ride (initial => X[0][0], Y[1][0] and final point => X2[0][1], Y2[1][1])
        status - Status of the ride
        kindOfRide - Kind of Ride (UberX, UberPool, UberBlack, UberVan)
        trafficCondition - Traffic condition when the ride is executed
        numOfPeople - number of people in that ride
